column2: "Woah, you already came up with something? What have you got?"
"Matching lucky charms? That's a great idea! If everyone's carrying the same thing, they're never really alone! At least, that's how I hope it'll make them feel."
"This is going to be a wonderful souvenir for everyone! By the way, how did you come up with the idea?"
"You say the way the enemy rushed you down made you think of traffic safety charms from Earth culture...?"

"I... see...
Anyway, I'd better start working on these so we have enough souvenirs for everyone! Thanks a bunch!"
